title: Emma Roberts is a stylish star in leopard print leather jacket and blue jeans as she runs errands
text:
She got stabbed in the neck with a syringe in the most recent episode of American Horror Story: 1984.

But like any leading lady, Emma Roberts is taking the latest installment of the FX anthology series in her stride.

The actress, 28, looked every inch the Hollywood star as she stepped out in LA on Thursday in a very stylish ensemble.

Looking good: Emma Roberts looked every inch the Hollywood star as she stepped out in LA on Thursday in a very stylish ensemble

Roberts ran her errands in a brown leopard print leather jacket paired with blue jeans.

She wore a brown top under the jacket and added buckled black ankle boots.

Her brunette hair was styled in a bun and she sported her favorite tortoiseshell-framed sunglasses.

She carried a black purse as well as her store purchases in one hand while she chatted away on her cell phone.

Out and about: The actress, 28, who's the lead on the new season of FX's American Horror Story, seems to be taking everything in her stride

Stylish ensemble: Roberts ran her errands in a brown leopard print denim jacket paired with blue jeans. She wore a brown top under the jacket and added buckled black ankle boots

Shopping trip: Her brunette hair was styled in a bun and she sported her favorite tortoiseshell-framed sunglasses

On the go: Roberts carried a black purse as well as her store purchases in one hand while she chatted away on her cell phone

In the new season of AHS, showrunner Ryan Murphy pays homage to classic slasher-horror flicks of the 1970s and '80s.

Roberts plays Brooke, one of a group of teenagers at camp who are being stalked by a masked killer.

'This year I’m playing more of the victim,' she explained to LA magazine.

'I’ve lost my voice several times from screaming. But playing the villain in Ryan Murphy World is great.'
description: The actress, 28, carried a black purse as well as her store purchases in one hand while she chatted away on her cell phone.
